response.summary: Seasoned mechanical engineer with 10 years of total experience, including 5 years in sales roles. Skilled in heavy lifting and transportation, technical support for heavy equipment, and financial management for engineering. Possesses in-depth knowledge of the renewables industry, with a focus on the conversion of biomass to produce biofuels. Proven track record of successful sales negotiations, exceptional customer service, and exceeding sales targets. Committed to establishing and maintaining strong customer relationships and achieving continued success in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
response.skills: Sales Operations, English, Project Bidding, Heavy Equipment, Maintenance & Repair, Planned Preventative Maintenance, Machinery, SAP BusinessObjects, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Negotiation, German, Technical Advisory, Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Heavy Lifting, Heavy Haul, Transportation Operations, Diesel Generators, Internal Combustion Engines, Hydraulic Systems

profile_positions.description: As a researcher, I investigated the production of biofuels using forest-based biomass and municipal waste. My work was focused on exploring the pelletization process and thermochemical conversion of biomass, as well as identifying pathways for sustainable and efficient bioenergy and biofuel production. My work has the potential to make a significant contribution to the development of clean and renewable energy sources, which could have a positive impact on the future of energy production.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Research Assistant

profile_positions.description: I supported student learning by answering questions, creating course materials, and leading review sessions. I helped students understand fundamental accounting principles, financial statements, and the application of financial concepts for decision making in the engineering field.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Teaching Assistant

profile_positions.description: I achieved new project sales through my technical sales skills. I played a critical role in technical structuring of heavy lifting and specialized transport solutions for the Energy, Oil & Gas, Mining, and Infrastructure industries and was successful in overseeing the bidding and commercial prospecting processes. My expertise in cost estimation for project execution, as well as my ability to coordinate transport and logistics operations, enabled me to negotiate deals and close business effectively. I provided on-site sales technical assistance and assessments, contributing to the overall revenue growth and surpassing the target revenue for the special projects division of the company.
profile_positions.title: Special Projects Sales Coordinator

profile_positions.description: I was responsible for managing the key accounts of the company in the country. My responsibilities included technical sales of lifting solutions, such as mobile cranes and specialized techniques, and new business development. I generated cost estimates and quotes, managed the CRM and pipeline, and administered contracts while ensuring compliance with technical, safety, and administrative requirements. I also provided on-site sales technical support and was responsible for developing market strategies. In addition, I oversaw the invoicing process and monitored payments from customers.
profile_positions.title: Key Account Manager

company.name: EMCALLISTER S.A.S - Grove, JLG, Linde Dealer

profile_positions.company: EMCALLISTER S.A.S - Grove, JLG, Linde Dealer
profile_positions.description: Driven by a focus on technical solutions and core market development, I was responsible to increase the market share of the company in my assigned territory. My responsibilities included technical sales of spare parts and services, negotiating service contracts and price agreements, and playing a key role in defining and quoting major repairs. I also had experience working with government contracting and providing technical support to the maintenance team. With my go-to-market strategy, I was able to exceed the sales budget and contribute to the growth of the parts and service department.
profile_positions.title: Parts and Service Sales Representative

profile_positions.description: While working on the Equipment Management Solutions team, I was involved in the administration of service contracts for a fleet of over 500 machines. I also offered technical support to customers and helped to define and standardize service plans. My responsibilities included scheduling and programming preventive maintenance, interpreting scheduled oil sampling, monitoring machines through satellite technology, and providing advice on machine performance and operation. As needed, I participated in defining and quoting corrective tasks.
profile_positions.title: Condition Monitoring Engineer

company.name: Mammoet
company.description:
Mammoet provides solutions to lifting, transporting, installing and decommissioning projects; from large and heavy to small and delicate structures. 

With a unique global network and an unparalleled fleet of equipment, our mission is to help clients improve construction efficiency and optimize the uptime of plants and installations. Our engineering expertise and high quality and safety standards, deliver value to a wide breadth of industry sectors and projects.  

Mammoet is proud to be part of SHV. SHV is a global family business with an impressive portfolio of companies with 55.000 employees in 58 countries: SHV Energy, Makro, Mammoet, ERIKS, Nutreco, NPM Capital and ONE-Dyas.

For more information, please visit our website.
